messages.title: Personalised Discovery Email
messages.content:
Subject: Discover Tailored Opportunities with Knight Frank

Dear [Client Name],

We are excited to share exclusive insights tailored to your specific interests and preferences. Whether you're considering new opportunities in the property market or simply seeking updated insights, our personalised approach ensures you receive only the most relevant information.

Explore potential investments with ease and confidence.

Warm regards,

Your Personal Advisor at Knight Frank

messages.title: Meeting Invitation Email
messages.content:
Subject: Your Upcoming Consultation

Dear [Client Name],

We're looking forward to our upcoming consultation, where we will discuss strategies and opportunities specifically catered to your needs. Please confirm your available time slots for a seamless discussion.

Looking forward to seeing you.

Sincerely,

Knight Frank Team

messages.title: Follow-Up Email Post-Meeting
messages.content:
Subject: Thank You for Meeting with Us

Dear [Client Name],

Thank you for taking the time to meet with us. We have compiled the discussed opportunities and actions and attached them for your review. Please feel free to reach out with any additional questions.

Best regards,

Your Knight Frank Team

messages.title: New Report Release Announcement
messages.content:
Subject: Explore Our Latest Market Insights

Dear [Client Name],

Discover our latest report highlighting key market trends and how they affect your interests. Our insights are tailored to provide you with the best opportunities and advice.

Access your exclusive copy and stay ahead.

Warm regards,

Knight Frank Insights Team

messages.title: Welcome to Knight Frank
messages.content:
Subject: Welcome to Your Personalised Real Estate Experience

Dear [Client Name],

Welcome to Knight Frank. We are thrilled to embark on this journey with you, offering bespoke solutions and tailored insights to match your aspirations.

Our team is here to assist you in every way.

Warmly,

Your Knight Frank Advisor

guides.title: Email Personalisation Guide
guides.content:
# Email Personalisation Strategy

Learn how to craft highly personalised client emails that enhance engagement and deliver value immediately. Include tailored insights and client-specific messaging.

guides.title: Client Meeting Preparation Guide
guides.content:
# Client Meeting Preparation Guide

Discover techniques to prepare for client meetings effectively, ensuring you offer value and insight tailored to client needs.

guides.title: Effective Follow-Up Engagement Guide
guides.content:
# Follow-Up Engagement Strategy

Utilise this guide to implement strategic follow-ups that reinforce client relationships and encourage action.

guides.title: Tailored Reports Creation Guide
guides.content:
# Tailored Reports Guide

A comprehensive approach to creating reports that speak directly to your client's interests and positioning you as a trusted advisor.

guides.title: Client Onboarding Welcome Guide
guides.content:
# Client Onboarding Welcome Guide

Ensure seamless client onboarding with this guide to warm welcomes and personalised introductions to Knight Frank's suite of services.
